concept.title: Community Groups
concept.abstract: The Community Groups feature gives organizations the capability to bundle accounts, contacts, and groups in a branded, dynamic, and interactive environment.

conbody.p: Community Groups promotes collaboration and engagement among members through the Community Portal. Authenticated and unauthenticated users can click on the Groups link in the navbar to search for groups of their interest. Search results are displayed in a tile format, with each tile representing an individual Group on the Groups Listing page. If enabled, use the search and filter components in the sidebar nav to find Groups in the system.

p.note: Staff users control the configurations for Community Group Search Settings via the Site record.

conbody.p: On each Group Detail page, staff users can display tabs to further engage with their members:

ul.li: Community Feed-Share files and information between fellow members.
Members-Search via the Group Member Search component and view profiles of the listed members.
Events-View and register for upcoming group events.

conbody.p: Portal users can view the Groups they hold active memberships in by navigating to their Profile page in the Community Portal and clicking the My Groups tab in the sidebar nav.
Click on the name of the Community Group to return the associated Group Detail page.
